original_text: At that time, enemies will fight God's people and kill many of them in war. They will take some of them away as prisoners to live in all the other countries. They will not be free to return home. People that are not Jews will destroy Jerusalem. They will rule here until it is time for them to stop.’
korean_text: 그들이 칼날에 죽임을 당하며 모든 이방에 사로잡혀 가겠고 예루살렘은 이방인의 때가 차기까지 이방인들에게 밟히리라

sentences.original_text: and kill many of them in war
sentences.korean_translation: 전쟁에서 그들 중 많은 사람을 죽일 것입니다

sentences.original_text: They will take some of them away as prisoners
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그들 중 일부를 포로로 잡아갈 것입니다

sentences.original_text: to live in all the other countries
They will not be free to return home
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 자유롭게 집으로 돌아갈 수 없을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: until it is time for them to stop
